lines.text: Please let's us take the generous town's providings, but the Lord giveth that he take it away. This is a good town, I only hope that all you good people could come with me... to the promised land.

[after Will goes out and sees that his books have all been torn up and pages scattered all over the camp]
Goddamn Barbarians!

[while watching Will have a spaz]
How did they get in?
Goddamn good question! You people just let them walk right in? The bloody cretins! The best minds of you are... Goddamn, Goddamn , Goddamn them!
She's crazier than a rat in a brandy keg!
